about_the_game:
She lives alone on a space station. However, nothing prevents this fiery space adventurer from inviting some friends to a raunchy party full of explicit sex and pornography. Enter the Cum is a puzzle game, you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures. The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand so that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute. There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience. This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

- Nudity or sexual content
- Not suitable for watching at work
- Not suitable for all ages
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old

Enter the CUM is a classic puzzle game. These puzzles will surely prove a tricky test for your brain. The beauty and elegance of the puzzles will surely make you fall in love with them. So just lean back, relax, and refresh your mind with this huge collection of puzzles. This slide puzzle game will improve your thinking skills, speed, and hand-eye coordination. You have to slide the tiles to reassemble a picture, by clicking the block you want to move.
Enter the CUM includes a total of 30 pictures.


Slide the block to fill in the blank and eliminate it.
A forward button will appear to the next jigsaw whenever you complete an image.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a Sliding Puzzle game that contains sexually explicit images, nude scenes, and sexual situations. All characters represent over 18 years of age. The content consists of scenes of vaginal, anal, and oral sex.
